source.name: CTA - Performance - Chart of Bus Runs Held Due to Absenteeism (2011, Jan-Aug)
source.description: This dataset shows bus runs held unfulfilled as a result of absenteeism. Absent, in this context, indicates unscheduled days off work. Note: Total does not include bus hold-ins caused by absenteeism related to the blizzard of February, 2011.
